TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Whoops, someone else beat me to it.

You can only do what you enjoy.

I wish for money.

Granted, you're so rich that everyone start attackong your house for money

I wish for Jah Radio

granted but its a toy jah radio

i wish i know what a jah radio was

Granted but you only know a vague description of what it is.

I wish I had a pet Walrus.

Granted, it's the guy from myth buster

(Jah radio is a radio station in GTA 3)

I wish for sonic screwdriver

Granted, but half of it is eaten by a flying shark.

I wish for more time to do homework.

granted but i read that wrong and gave you no time!

i wish i didnt have to do homework for the rest of my life

You don't but you can't passe your exam now

I wish to understand anthropology

Granted, but you forget how to breathe in the process.

I wish I had an infinitely fast internet connection.

Granted but you have bandwith cap of 10 GB a month and then it dies

I wish to make 10 million dollars a year to sit on my butt

Granted, but your also sitting on a pile of stakes.

i wish for stock in Pepsi so I can get my own personal supply of cherry Pepsi.

granted, Pepsi's stock immediately plummets.

I wish for more technological advancements.

Granted. The human race becomes converted to Cyberform.

I wish for earplugs

Granted, but they are made of needles.

I wish for more boosters.

Granted, but they are still not enough

I wish for Android Hell

Granted, you're a turret going to the redemption

I wish for a MLP communist state

Granted, but it is quickly overrun by anti-brony freedom fighters.

I wish for a girlfriend.

Granted she is extremely controlling.

I wish it was Wednesday.

Granted, but it is quickly overrun by anti-brony freedom fighters.

I wish for a girlfriend.

Granted, But 40 years later, You find out, That "She" Was a "He".. You subsequently die of a terrible heart attack and arrive in the land of 72 Virgi- Oh wait.. These are the opposite of that.. You arrive in the Red light district of the sky.. And the people who "Service" There have been doing it for 50 years.. Have You ever been in a cave?

I wish that I didn't sometimes dream of cheese.

Edited October 16, 2013 by Bobhendly
Ninjas...

Granted she is extremely controlling.

I wish it was Wednesday.

Granted, But a camel steps on you lethally saying "WHAT DAAY!?"

I Wish that I wasn't living in a potato.

Granted, You're living in a carrot.

I wish for Wednesday!

Granted, it's tomorrow. (and tomorrow never gets here)

I wish for pizza.

Granted. It arrives in 3 years.

I want hump day!

Granted, you get humped all day by men in panda costumes.

I wish cold and flu season would go away.

Granted, the salmonella season comes instead.

I wish for something to wish for.
